text: Bruce King (April 6, 1924 â€“ November 13, 2009) was an American businessman and politician. He was a three non-consecutive four-year terms as the Governor of New Mexico. King was a member of the Democratic Party. He was the longest- serving governor in New Mexico history, with 12 years of service. He died on November 13, 2009 in Stanley, New Mexico of heart failure at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Members of the New Mexico Legislature Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Businesspeople from New Mexico Category:Governors of New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Military people from New Mexico
title: Bruce King
